alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascade Foothills; Western Columbia River Gorge (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 28 at 4:30AM PST until February 28 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 6 inches, heaviest above 1000 feet. * WHERE...In Oregon, Coast Range of Northwest Oregon, Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Western Columbia River Gorge. In Washington, South Washington Cascade Foothills and Western Columbia River Gorge. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: South Washington Cascade Foothills; Western Columbia River Gorge
